name: Homegear::getFamilySetting
description: This method returns a family setting from the family settings file or the database. If the same setting exists in the database and the settings file, the database value is returned.

parameters.name: familyId
parameters.description: The family ID to get the setting for

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the setting to return. Setting names from the configuration files are converted to lower case characters. So to get "mySetting" pass "mysetting" here.

returnValue: Returns the setting. Possible types are integer, string and binary.
